بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
أطال اللّه بقاك وأدام عزّك وكرامتك وجعلني فداك
وصلت رقعتك أعزّك اللّه الّتي ووقفت بعثت ø على على به ما ذكرت
فيها من أثمنة أمر الفدادين وسئلتك ومسئلتك العزم في
زرعها لك معما أزرعه لنفسي فقد كنت أعلمتك
أعزّك اللّه قبل هذا الوقت أنّي لو لم أزرع إلّا هذه
الفدّانين لكانت لك عندي قليل حطيطة وقد
تسجّلت أعزّك اللّه في غير بيعة بأسعار شتّى
بدينر ÷÷ ودينر ÷÷÷÷ ÷÷÷÷÷ ودينر ÷÷÷÷ ودينر ÷÷
الفدّان فما خلا بقليل من هذه الأسعار
اكتب إلي حتّى أعزم عليك في تلك البيعة
بعينها فواللّه يأخي لو زرعتها لك وأدّيت
الخراج كلّه من مالي وحملته إلى منزلك
ما حمدت لنفسي پڤسى نفسي ڤپرل فرأيك أعزّك اللّه

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
May God prolong your life and may He cause your might and honour to continue and may He make me your ransom.
Your note - may God exalt you - which you sent to me (and) in which you mentioned
some prices for the faddân, has arrived. Now I had asked you to decide about
their cultivation on your behalf together with anything that I cultivate for myself; for I have already informed you -
may God exalt you - before this (present) time that, if I had only cultivated these
... Nachlass, Reduktion... two faddâns, I had (only) little for you at disposal. You had
... bei mehr als einem Kauf... - may God exalt you - already decreed decisively about the non-selling for different prices - viz. - may God exalt you - already decreed decisively in more than one sale for different prices - viz.
for 4 1/6 dînârs, [.]+1/2+1/24+1/48 of a dînâr,3 1/3+1/12 dînârs and 5 1/3 dînârs
per faddân - but whatever varies even by a little from these prices,
write to me (about it) so that I may regard your information to me respecting that sale
itself as decisive. By God, O my brother, if I had cultivated it for you and had paid
the whole land-tax out of my own money and carried it to your house,
(dann) würde ich mich nicht loben. Bilde Dir also - Gott stärke Dich - über das, was geschehen soll, I would not have praised myself ......... to you - may God exalt you - ...........
.......... if God wills.
May God prolong your life and may He cause your might to continue and may He make me your ransom.
